short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture snippets from webpages to read later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The "Read Later List" Chrome extension is a handy tool designed to help users save snippets of text from any webpage to read at a later time. With just a few clicks, users can highlight text on any webpage, right-click, and select "Add to Read Later List" to save the snippet along with the URL of the original webpage. The extension provides a convenient way to collect interesting quotes, important information, or articles for future reference without interrupting the browsing experience. Users can easily manage their Read Later list and access saved snippets through a dedicated popup window, allowing for seamless organization and quick access to saved content. With the "Read Later List" extension, users can efficiently collect and revisit valuable information from the web at their convenience.
